item.title: Website Development for a Transport Company
item.description: Overview: The project involved the creation of two distinct websites for a transport company. The first website, aimed at customers, would provide information about the company’s services, while the second, an intranet site, would serve as a secure platform for entrepreneurs in the transport industry to access exclusive content. The project was independently planned and implemented using WordPress and hosted on a Finnish service provider. Challenge: The client needed both websites to be fast, user-friendly, visually appealing, and easily editable.
